body.name: Delta Children Cruzer Double Stroller – Lightweight Side by Side with Reclining Seats, Extendable Canopies and Flat Fold, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26. Order within 4 hrs 10 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 25 mins
features: LIGHTWEIGHT, COMPACT DESIGN: This lightweight stroller makes any outing easier | Ideal for everyday use or travel, it only weighs 29.8 lbs. and features a compact flat fold with auto latch lock | Stroller fits through standard 30-inch doorways

RIDE SIDE BY SIDE: Kids will comfortably ride side by side in this versatile double stroller | Stroller has 2 extendable canopies w/ peek-a-boo windows, adjustable footrests and multi-position recline | Faux leather handlebar/child bar adds a stylish touch
TONS OF STORAGE: This stroller has plenty of storage space |Two detachable storage pockets with clear windows and storage baskets under the seats ensure you never leave anything at home

LOCKABLE SWIVEL WHEELS: This double stroller equipped swivel front wheels and one-step locking back breaks | Puncture-poof airless EVA foam wheels ensure a smooth ride over all types of everyday terrain | 8-inch front wheels | 10-inch back wheels

SAFE OPTION: JPMA certified | 5-point safety harnesses | Reflective shoulder pads | Recommended for ages 6 months up to 35 lbs. per seat (70 lbs. total) | Assembled dimensions: 35.5”L x 28.7”W x 42.1”H | Folded dimensions: 13.4"L x 28.7"W x 32"H
body.description: Siblings, twins or friends can ride side by side comfortably with the Delta Children Cruzer Double Stroller. Featuring front swivel wheels for 360-degree maneuverability and one-step back brake for ultra-smooth rides, this double stroller will not weigh you down thanks to its lightweight frame and puncture-proof airless tires that will never go flat. The stroller’s two front-facing seats feature multi-position recline, adjustable footrests and two extendable canopies with peek-a-boo windows for ultimate comfort. Two detachable storage pockets on the back and extra-large storage baskets under the seats ensure you have plenty space for all your travel necessities. The compact, flat fold with auto latch lock provide ultimate convenience. Designed with a soft, faux leather handlebar and child bar, the modern design of this everyday stroller is easy to navigate, transport, and store. Stroller features two 5-point safety harness and reflective shoulder pads. Each seat supports kids from 6 months, up to 35 lbs. (70 lbs. total). Product dimensions are 35.5 L x 28.7 W x 42.1 H inches. It weighs 29.8 lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a good stroller!
reviews.reviewText: I got this side by side stroller and It feels like a luxury stroller without the luxury price tag. Very good quality, size… beautiful! Worth every penny :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm so impressed
reviews.reviewText: I'm not really one to write product reviews but I am so psyched about this stroller. We have an 18 month old and one on the way. After the Mockingbird recall I didn't feel comfortable continuing to use our stroller even with the replacement part, so I went on the hunt for a new double stroller, thinking I'd try a side by side instead. I was planning to purchase one at a WAY higher price point but kept coming back to this one because..well...$200 is unbeatable and worth a try before buying an expensive one. It had very few reviews and I've never heard of this one being recommended so I didn't have high expectations. I literally went on a three hour long tangent with excitement after putting this together. It glides and maneuvers like a DREAM compared to our Mockingbird, I love being able to recline or lift the foot rest of each seat separately, the basket below is huge, it comes with 2 convenient storage attachments at the handle bar for parents, huge sun shades that extend far down, it FITS THROUGH TIGHT DOORWAYS!!, and the leather accents are attractive. Only negative worth mentioning is it is a bit of a struggle to lift the weight of it into my trunk by myself.I'm just psyched. I feel like I know the best secret no one else has caught onto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to put together and fold up!
reviews.reviewText: When the stroller arrived I took it out of the box and started assembling it. All I had to do is pull it outwards and it pushes right out of it's fold into a stroller. You just pop the wheels right into place and they lock in. I loved how easy the wheels go in and lock. It really makes life easier when you need to travel and maybe take it apart for a trip. The stroller has such a beautiful modern look! My 2.5 year old and 1 year old are loving the stroller. The harness is really good quality and keeps them in their seats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There are so many pros and cons to this stroller. Summed up, it is a gorgeous stroller, drives smooth, and feels sturdy. Some pros: The leatherette details on the handle bar and child bar makes the stroller look lux and the black is very sleek. The stroller glides and drives like a dream! It is so smooth, and the turn radius is very good. The price is really good for what you get. The canopies are good, but don’t cover all the way like other double strollers do. The peekaboo in the canopies are a plastic instead of a mesh. The leg rests are a great size and can fit a taller child well. The stroller also feels very sturdy and durable. However, the drawbacks were as follows: although it folds flat (which is good), it was to much of a hassle to fold and has some weight to it (thinking of ability while out in a parking lot). It does not stand up on its own from folding, but it can “stand” on its side. The stroller took up quite a bit of space in our 2022 Honda CR-V trunk (although when standing on its side, it saved some space). There is no step ledge for a child to step up on to get into the stroller. Not a deal breaker, but something I noticed. The seats had a good recline, but the latches to move the seat up or down had to be fidgeted a bit to work. It is also rated for 35 lbs in each seat. Other double strollers have a higher weight capacity.Overall, it is a great pick with some drawbacks. Ultimately we returned it because it didn’t meet our personal needs of what we wanted, but if we had different needs/wants in our stroller, this would be the one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use stroller
reviews.reviewText: Love this stroller! Use it for my 8 month old and my 3 year old. I absolutely loveee how it reclines back for long walks when they fall asleep. Its easy to pack up and great to maneuver. The best part of the stroller is the way it reclines for my babies feet so they arent dangling andddddd theres a peep window for when the shade is all the way down. Loving this stroller so far and my daughters absolutely light upp when i place them inside it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need this one
reviews.reviewText: i wanted to test this stroller before writing a review, and I am very glad i did. I really put it to test, first at a pumpkin patch (gravel, grass) and then a couple times at Disneyland and let me tell ya… it did not disappoint! Specially at Disney where; if you have been, then you know they make you fold the stroller before you get on the tram, before we got this stroller we had the uppa baby (set up for both kids) and you pretty much have to put it apart to fold it… that sucked, but this one… easiest double stroller to fold! One click and bam! When you have 2 kiddos anxious to get to Disney you gotta move quick so this is now our everyday stroller. So I would totally recommend it! It has pockets behind each chair to put your personal items and storage at bottom is pretty spacious too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THIS COMPANY
reviews.reviewText: This is your warning to Not buy from delta children. We got this stroller a little over a year ago. Worked fine for 6 months and started to break on us. Reached out to their customer service team to fix or replace and they have basically got me chasing them for 6 months now. They promised to replace ny my stroller and ask that I make holes in mine as proof of destruction and its been weeks with no reply from them. I now have a broken stroller with holes in it and no reply from them in 2 weeks.Most dysfunctional customer service systems and company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight and looks so good
reviews.reviewText: I recently got this amazing double stroller for my kids and it’s just perfect. Setting it up was so easy, it me took less than 15mins. It’s light weight and folds easily. The quality is really good too.
